article.headline: Oral Roberts 48, Loyola Chi 44
article.story: TULSA, Okla. (AP) -- Caleb Green scored 12 of his game-high 17 points in the second half, including the tiebreaking basket with 1:41 left, to lead Oral Roberts past Loyola (Ill.) 48-44 on Wednesday night. Luke Spencer-Gardner sank two free throws with 7½ seconds remaining to clinch the victory for the Golden Eagles (4-0). Green also was the leading rebounder with 14. Ken Tutt scored 12 points for ORU. Dave Telander, who was 4-of-6 on 3-pointers, came off the bench to pace the Ramblers (2-3) with 16 points and DaJuan Gouard added 10 points. The combined 92 points were the fewest for a home game in ORU basketball's 40-year history. The Golden Eagles, who led 22-17 at halftime, stretched their advantage to 30-22 early in the second half before Loyola went on a 10-2 spurt to tie the game 32-32 with 11 minutes remaining. Telander's 3-pointer and Pierre Parker's two free throws gave Loyola its only lead at 37-34. But ORU's Jonathan Bluitt answered with a trey for a 37-37 tie at 9:20. A reverse layup by Gouard forged the last tie at 44-44 with two minutes remaining. After Green's go-ahead basket, Gouard missed a 10-footer with 10 seconds left that could have tied the game again. ORU opened the game with a 9-2 spurt but Loyola answered with seven straight points. The game was tied 14-14 with 6:30 left before halftime before ORU went on a 7-0 run to take a lead into intermission.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
